item.title: fuzzy hashing
item.description: Fuzzy hashing helps us to perform similarity analysis - match two files with minor differences based on the fuzzy hash values. One of the examples of fuzzy hashing is the usage of SSDeep.

item.title: Welcome to my Knowledgebase
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi there! Welcome to my digital knowledge baseâ€”a curated collection of my learning journey in cybersecurity, networking, AI, and more. This is where I document my notes, methodologies, and experiments as I explore the world of technology.

item.title: Email Header
item.description: What is an Email Header? The header is a section of the email containing information such as sender, recipient, and date. There are also components such as â€˜Return-Pathâ€™, â€˜Reply-Toâ€™, and â€˜Receivedâ€™.

item.title: Fast Flux
item.description: Fast Flux is a DNS technique used by botnets to hide Phishing, web proxying, malware delivery, and malware communication activities behind compromised hosts acting as proxies ...

item.title: Gaining Initial Foothold
item.description: 1. Reconnaissance Reconnaissance is the first step and it provides adversary with all the info needed for getting into a system. It is described in more detail in Reconnaissance page.

item.title: Hash
item.description: A hash value is a numeric value of a fixed length that uniquely identifies data. It is the result of a hashing algorithm. Common Hash Types MD5 (Message Digest, defined by RFC 1321 MD5 is a widely used cryptographic hash function with a 128-bit hash value.

item.title: MITRE ATT&CK Matrix
item.description: What is ATT&CK Matrix? ðŸ¤” MITRE ATT&CK Matrix is a visualization method used to classify and see attack methods of cyber attackers. Matrices can be customized for almost any subject and turned into useful visuals.

item.title: MITRE ATT&CK Mitigations
item.description: What are Mitigations? Mitigations refers to the measures and actions that can be taken in response to the techniques in the MITRE ATT&CK matrix. Each mitigation has a unique ID, name and description that provides clear understanding about them.

item.title: MITRE ATT&CK Tactics
item.description: What is Tactic? Tactic expresses the purpose of the cyber attacker and the reason for his action. Tactics are one of the most important MITRE ATT&CK Framework components used to group cyber attacker behaviors and see the attack steps.
